title: 3 and Out - Russell Wilson's Walk Back; John's Weekend Revelation; Packers/Rodgers Mess; Rapid Fire NFL Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Russell Wilson's Walk Back; John's Weekend Revelation; Packers/Rodgers Mess; Rapid Fire NFL Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John reacts to Russell Wilson publicly walking back his trade demand from earlier in the offseason, lets listeners in on his big revelation about the future of the NFL relative to the other major professional sports, runs through the worsening Packers/Aaron Rodgers mess and other NFL headlines, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
